elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the questions on the factual text "Climate protection measures".

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What measures are being taken in Switzerland to contribute to climate protection?
elements.correctAnswer: The 2015 Paris Climate Agreement aims to limit global warming caused by greenhouse gases to below 2 degrees. The long-term goal is to phase out fossil fuels such as coal, oil and gas. In the long term, the federal government is pursuing the goal of a "2000-watt society". This model aims to reduce per capita energy consumption in the long term thanks to technological development and renunciation.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What goals are being pursued with the idea of the "2000-watt society"?
elements.correctAnswer: Per capita energy consumption is to be reduced to 2,000 watts instead of the current 6,000 watts thanks to technological developments and the avoidance of travel and private transport.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: List as many measures as possible that each and every individual should implement to protect the environment.
elements.correctAnswer: Showering only briefly, flying less, using electric instead of gasoline/diesel vehicles, local products instead of products from other continents, etc.
